name: The Great Netventure
description:
A Railshooter game used to teach HighSchool Students about Malwares on the Internet.

This project was developed in 2014 for a games' course in the Master's in Computer Science and Engineering of Técnico Lisboa. The text is totally in Portuguese.

Controls
  • Keyboard Arrows: Move ship around.
  • Space Bar: Shoot selected bullet.
  • 1: Select Anti-virus bullet.
  • 2: Select Anti-spyware bullet.
  • 3: Select Software Update bullet (to use against the Hacker).
  • Mouse: Click on buttons.
